meanings.definition: The act or process of forming a mental image or concept of the future.
meanings.sent1: Her visioning of a peaceful world inspired many.
meanings.sent2: The team engaged in visioning to plan their project.
meanings.sent3: During her visioning exercise, she imagined flying on a unicorn.
meanings.sent4: His visioning of success was like painting a masterpiece in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The power of visioning can turn dreams into reality.

meanings.definition: The act or process of envisioning or imagining something.
meanings.sent1: His visioning of a new invention led to great innovations.
meanings.sent2: The artist's visioning of the final painting was clear in her mind.
meanings.sent3: In his visioning session, he imagined a world where cats ruled.
meanings.sent4: Her visioning of a perfect vacation was like a mental escape.
meanings.sent5: The magic of visioning can spark creativity and innovation.
